price: 84. Kaadu meqe saareey, meqe xagar xagó (galab-xagó) yoh ab ellecabô maray yok lakal yamaatu waah addal Qhiyaamah ayró fanah.
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
